title: "AI drug discovery startup Quris launches with $9M to predict drug success starting with rare diseases"
excerpt: "Quris, a new artificial intelligence startup, thinks it has the tools to predict whether a drug candidate will work safely in humans. The drug discovery company launches with $9 million in angel funding to help reduce risks and costs associated with failed clinical trials."
